H0.text: Germination is the process that passes genetic information from plants to their offspring.

H1.text: Pollination is the process that passes genetic information from plants to their offspring.

H2.text: Photosynthesis is the process that passes genetic information from plants to their offspring.

H3.text: Adaptation is the process that passes genetic information from plants to their offspring.

A4.text: Pollination is the transfer of pollen from an anther of a plant to the stigma of a plant, later enabling fertilisation and the production of seeds.
